rJ8phfhd.title: Countermeasures Research of Leading Academic Innovation Relying on the Advantages in Social Science Research in Universities
rJ8phfhd.abstract: Social science research in universities has its advantages in aspects of discipline construction,teaching team,research power and academic resources.It becomes a major force of social science research,and in a certain extent,leads the academic trend of social science research.To promote academic innovation,build up a better nationwide innovation and employment environment and realize the national innovation project goals,we must set up the academic system,innovate the mechanism,integrate the social science research force in universities,construct a communication platform for universities and the society,and lead the teachers in universities to take part in the local economy and culture construction.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Liberal Arts,Guangxi Normal University,Guilin,Guangxi

7TiT2ExW.title: The Axiological Basis for Reconstruction of Literary Theory
7TiT2ExW.abstract: The present literary theory based on epistemology claims that literature,as perception of life,reveals the literary essence and related ideology and thus becomes a form to understand and reflect life.This viewpoint leads to the neglect of the psychological demand of subject as well as the axiological relation and significance relating its expression and satisfaction to the nature of object in this need.In that case,the system of literary theory is obviously based on the axiology and the reconstruction is beneficial for the development of literary theory.

authors.name: Zhang Liqun
authors.org: College of Chinese Language and Literature,Guangxi Normal University,Guilin,Guangxi ,China

WSCyNAkY.title: On the Building of a New Tradition of Guangxi Literature During Three decades'Reform and Opening-up
WSCyNAkY.abstract: During three-decade of reform and opening up,Guangxi Literature is heading for the rising from silence.The successful experience of cultural priority strategy is universal for the economically underdeveloped areas,and of great innovation and the surmounting significance.for the history and the tradition of GuangXi Literature,On the basis of literature experience and achievements a new literature tradition is formed and built.The determination of the nature of innovation and development,characteristics and the function is of great and far-reaching significance for GuangXi Literature in the process of the sustainable development and breakthrough.
keywords: new tradition of reform and opening up

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of chinese lanuage and Literature,Guangxi Normal University,Guilin,Guangxi ,China

rjtzLElB.title: On 3 Dimensional Structure of Literature Critical Principle and Its Practical Significance
rjtzLElB.abstract: The critical principle is the basic one which critical behaviors and activities must obey,and it is also the core value orientation to ensure and standardize critic and development.The science,professional ethics and specialty orientation forms the 3 dimensional value system,so it plays an important role in promoting critic subjectivity and automaticity and overcoming critic weakness.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Literature Guangxi Normal University,Guilin Guangxi

nOYY1duO.title: PROBING THE PARADOX AND THE CAUSE OF THE LITERATURE SYSTEM AND ART
nOYY1duO.abstract: The system of literature and art must follow the double mechanism of the social law and the literature and art law. Its institutionalize, system, regulation and independence, autonomy, freedom constitute contradiction and conflict, thus form the paradox of the system of literature and art. In its double functions with normal guarantee to literature and art, on one hand’ it plays positive founction, on the other hand playing passive negative function.in the institutional drawback. we should innovate and pefect the system of literature and art through the reforms of the system, mechanism, promoting prosperity and development of literature and art.
keywords: the system of literature and art

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Dept. of Chinese Language, Guangxi Normal University, Guilin Guangxi

f02R9Vof.title: On Writer's Motives in Writing
f02R9Vof.abstract: Liu Xie proposed"establishing one's virtue and expounding one's ideas in writing" from the perspective of writer's motives in writing.It was mainly from "gentle saying with the bright way" and "expounding one's idea in writing " to raise celebrity and the "immortality",transcend the limitation of "catch margin" and illustrated the writer's writing motive as well as his motive of creating The Literary Mind and The Craving of Dragon by criticizing such respects as the drawbacks of the literary world at that time,etc.This was of great value and significance in strengthening the writer's creating consciousness and initiative,which promoted the construction and development of the writer's criticism and the theory about writer.
keywords: Gentle Saying with the Bright Way
Establishing One's Virtue and Expounding One's Ideas in Writing

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Guangxi Normal University,Guilin ,China

f02R9Vof.venue: Journal of Xinjiang Finance & Economy Institute

AcF6AYnH.title: Ideas and the Way of Deepening the Literary Criticism Course Construction and Teaching Reform
AcF6AYnH.abstract: Literature criticism curriculum reform must rethink its nature,and establish a position of the theory in application course system,unite the course construction and teaching reform in the curriculum design organically,in updating teaching materials and teaching contents,training teaching personnel,teaching method reform,form software and hardware construction and practice base construction,an system and mechanism should be built.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Guangxi Normal University,Guilin ,China

66hCv4NP.title: On Building the Esthetic Spirit of a Harmonious Society and Its Guidance
66hCv4NP.abstract: The esthetic spirit of a harmonious society,is not only the realistic need for the social development,but also the need for carrying forward the outstanding Chinese national cultural tradition.The harmonious consciousness and virtues accumulate in the historical culture of 5,000 years of Chinese civilization,which have built the foundation of the harmonious spirit by the ways of Confucian and morals mutually supplementing and inside and outside mutually infiltrating.The modern harmonious society in inheriting and developing has promoted person's comprehensive quality and enhanced the life quality with its modern consciousness,thus is characterized by esthetic spirit and presents the esthetic value and significance of a harmonious society a harmonious society.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Guangxi Normal University Guilin Guangxi

PaYAIdPN.title: Ideas and Approaches to Developing the Hometown of Chinese Folk Art Forms——Based on the Construction of Wenchang Village in Lipu,Guangxi
PaYAIdPN.abstract: Developing the hometown of Chinese folk art forms should be based on the protection of intangible cultural heritages,should clarify the relationships between application and construction,protection and development,traditional value and practical significance,and should establish the right development ideas and direction.Guangxi Wenchang folk art is the pearl in Chinese folk art forms.Through theoretical study and practice on the construction of Wenchang Village in Lipu,a long-term mechanism has been formed and guaranteed by institutions,guided by the government and supported by the civilians,which reflects the features and advantages of its development ideas and approaches.Wenchang Village is a typical case of the hometown of Chinese folk art forms.
keywords: the hometown of Chinese folk art forms

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Liberal Arts,Guangxi Normal University,Guilin,Guangxi,,China

PaYAIdPN.venue: Journal of Xihua University(Philosophy & Social Sciences)

SDXeu2ry.title: The Formation and Construction of Folk Art System
SDXeu2ry.abstract: Folk art system is a hidden,potential and commonly accepted art system in contrast with the official one.Its components mainly are:the primitive one that is succeeded and developed in the primitive witchcraft,primitive religion,primitive worship and ceremony;the one relying folk customs and cultural tradition;the one that forms and constructs to protect itself.They interact with each other to form the folk art system and become the necessary components of social art system.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Chinese Department,Guangxi Normal University,Yulin Guangxi ,China

SDXeu2ry.venue: Journal of Jishou University(Social Sciences Edition)

5tF2lY0q.title: Value and Measures in Protection of Guangxi Wenchang Intangible Cultural Heritage
5tF2lY0q.abstract: Guangxi Wenchang is the representative work of folk arts with long history and enriched cultural aesthetic connotation. Though it has developed in the difficult and tortuous process,it still emanates great value and charm with expression techniques and colorful content suiting both refined and popular tastes. Faced with threats and challenges from cultural transformation in present social economy,specific measures should be taken to protect this valuable cultural inheritage,such as instituting and implementing practical systems and regulations.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Literature,Guangxi Normal University,Guilin,Guangxi,,China

5tF2lY0q.venue: Journal of Xihua University(Philosophy & Social Sciences)

r8jEeAU3.title: Creative Achievement and Influence of Poet Group in Late Qing Dynasty
r8jEeAU3.abstract: Cedar Lake Ten Poets gathered by the bank of Cedar Lake in Guilin,whose works brought together into a book with prominent fea tures,high achievement,far-reaching influence and the more obvious literary genre characteristics.Their works play an important role in the promo tion of the development of western literature and poetics development and significance in late Qing Dynasty.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Literature,Guangxi Normal University,Guangxi Guilin,

r8jEeAU3.venue: Journal of Guangxi Normal University for Nationalities

6czZvA1Y.title: On Liu Xie’s Dynamic Creation and Triple-meaning Construction of Image
6czZvA1Y.abstract: Liu Xie’s image theory in Wen Xin Diao Long gives an integrated and systematic exposition of the creative,transformational and constructive process of the artistic image. "The harmony of mental and physical world" is to illustrate the image creation in the creative process. "The image through integrated observation" is to explain the image transformation in the appreciative process. "The implication between the lines" is to show the image extension of the image beyond image. In this way,the transformational and constructive process of the dynamic development of image is constituted and the foundation of the artistic image theory is laid.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Chinese Language & Literature,Guangxi Normal University,Guilin ,China

6czZvA1Y.venue: Journal of Shanxi University(Philosophy and Social Science Edition)

tuTR44T0.title: Long Novel: New Breakthrough of Guangxi Writer Group
tuTR44T0.abstract: For the solution of present problems and the further growth,long novel is a new breakthrough and strategy for Guangxi Writer Group to win greater attention and development in reflection on experience and lessons and in help of interaction of creation and criticism.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Chinese Language and Literature,Guangxi Normal University,Guilin,Guangxi ,China

tuTR44T0.venue: Journal of Guangxi Normal University for Nationalities

LbQlH0bC.title: The Culture Connotation and the Significance of Criticizing Methodology in Liu Xie's "Rectifying the Fake Articles"
LbQlH0bC.abstract: Dragons-Carving and the Literary Mind · rectifying fake articles written by Liu Xie not only suggest the viewpoint about it,but also bring forward a viewpoint that the fake articles is making "unprofitable" to the classic theory but conducive to the writing of average articles.On one hand,the guiding ideology of advocating classics is established.On the other hand,from characteristic property literature visual angles to observe a fake article,some useful information,varied and colorful techniques of expression in myth,legend,stories can be found which were mentioned in the fake article.It is of significance to make use of "rectifying" and "thinking" in the culture and the criticizing methodology.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Guangxi Normal University,Guilin ,China

LbQlH0bC.venue: Journal of Xinjiang Finance & Economics Institute

J4Gr5IwE.title: Probe into Artistic Education and Its Educational Reform in Stage Practice——On large-scale national musical “Liu Sanjie in Heart”
J4Gr5IwE.abstract: Deepening the reform in art education must focus on practical teaching system,including stage performances.Based on the teaching reform and brand building,the large-scale national musical"Liu Sanjie in Heart",planned,created,and performed by Guilin Normal College,inherit and carry forward the Liu Sanjie's cultural traditions,make use of local ethnic cultural resources,and create the new cultural brand of Liu Sanjie with the times to obtain achievements in artistic education reform and the building of cultural arts brand.

authors.name: Zhang Liqun
authors.org: School of Chinese,Guangxi Normal University,Guilin,Guangxi ,China

qygnfbO5.title: On Lingui Ci Origin and Yuexi Poet Impact : A Series of Research on Lingui Ci(Ⅲ)
qygnfbO5.abstract: Lingui Ci came up in the late Qing Dynasty,but its origins can be traced back to the western Guangdong culture and western Guangdong Ci rise and development.A region in western Guangdong and Lingui is of outstanding people,to the Qing Dynasty in politics,culture,literature,education,imperial aspects make a spurt of progress,the formation of Lingui CI breeding environment and context of traditional literati,especially in CI form mutual influence groups,actively promote the Lingui School of Ci and its leader Wang Pengyun,Kuangzhouyi growth,which fully shows in Lingui.Send the main reason,also showed a centrally western culture and Western writers in the Ci 's achievement.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Guangxi Normal University,Guilin Guangxi

aBAeCGuj.title: On the Creative Characteristics of Ci School of Lingui County and Its Innovative Significance of Ci Theory——A Series of Research on Ci School of Lingui County(Ⅱ)
aBAeCGuj.abstract: The rise of Lingui Ci School occupied an important position in the field of Ci in the later Qing Dynasty and promoted the resurgence of Qing Dynasty's Ci.Wang Yun-peng and Kuang Zhou-yi,as the leading figures,had established the style featured by composition,comment,and their central theories by inheriting and improving the tradition of "expressing meanings by simple words" and "adopting proofs by contrasting and starting" by Changzhou Schools' tradition,adhering to the principle of "stressing clumsiness and largeness." The practice and theory put forward in Essay on Ci by Hui Feng had consolidated Lingui School's poetic and theoretical base,further deepened and expanded its function,propaganda and effects,and had important innovative meaning in the aspects of poetic theory and practice.
keywords: Essay on Ci by Hui Feng

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Chinese Language and Literature,Guangxi Normal University,Guilin  China

aBAeCGuj.venue: Journal of Guangxi Teachers Education University(Philosophy and Social Sciences Edition)

gbh0eTE9.title: On the Multi-dimensional Construction of Core Value Orientation of Ancient Chinese Literary Criticism
gbh0eTE9.abstract: Ancient Chinese literary criticism inherited and carried forward the ideological culture tradition of "harmony" and "nature" respectively from the schools of Confucianism and Taoism in the period of Earlier Qin and built up the evaluation dimension of harmonious beauty and natural beauty in its development.What's more,it took a deeper grasp of the underlying essence of "Theory of Mind" with the critical spirit and constructed the critical core value system in the complementary interaction and the harmonious integration.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Chinese Language and Literature,Guangxi Normal University,Guilin ,China

gbh0eTE9.venue: Journal of Shanxi University(Philosophy and Social Science Edition)

okP550Ie.title: Literary Implications and Significance of Heart of Tao in "Original Tao"
okP550Ie.abstract: In "Original Tao" of Wenxin Diaolong, Liu Xie put forward the notion of "heart of Tao," stressing not only the understanding and holding of the spirit of Tao, but also the connection between "Tao" and "heart," pushing it to the literary viewpoint on the philosophical basis of natural Tao. The so-called original Tao is essentially original human being and original heart. Consequently, the expressive theoretical system is established on the basis of "heart of Tao," which argues that literature is actually learning of human beings and of heart.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Liberal Arts, Guangxi Normal University, Guilin, Guangxi

okP550Ie.venue: Journal of Shantou University(Humanities & Social Sciences Edition)

WeCqZJkR.title: On the Stylistic Significance and Critical Sense of Liu Xie's “Style Distinctions”
WeCqZJkR.abstract: Liu Xie made a discussion on “distinguishing and differentiating” in the “Stylistics” of “Literary Carvings of Dragon”. Aiming at the shortcomings of “ absurd styles”、“ erroneous styles”、“varied styles” and “lost styles”,he put forward the requisition of “amending styles”. From “six views”、“six senses”and “four rules”to grasp the meaning and substance of “style qualities”and “style situations”, his theory of “style distinctions” had far-reaching significance on literary theory as well as literary criticism.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Chinese Language and Literature, Guangxi Normal University, Guilin , Guangxi, China

WeCqZJkR.venue: Journal of Guangxi Teachers Education University(Philosophy and Social Sciences Edition)

dJp7YZ9D.title: The Landscape Literature Achievements of Ancient Guiling Visiting-Literati and Their Impact
dJp7YZ9D.abstract: Being Influenced and pushed by Guiling Visiting-Literati in the cultural exchange context is an important feature of Guangxi literature development in the past dynasties;the rise and flourishing of the landscape literary is an important feature of Guiling Visiting literary development.The majority of these literature are related to landscape;they expressed their emotions through natural sceneries of Guilin,or stated their ambitions inspired by the objects around.This kind of landscape literary creation mode not only better promotes and disseminates the natural beauty of the landscape of Guilin,but also lay a solid status for the Guiling Visiting-Literati in the history of Chinese landscape literature.
keywords: "The mountains and waters of Guilin are the finest under heaven"
state ambitions inspired by the objects around
take advantage of a scene to express one's emotion

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Literature,Guangxi Normal University,Guiling,Guangxi

fBe0lUi1.title: ON THREE-DIMENSIONAL STRUCTURE BY LIU XIE'S IMAGE THEORY
fBe0lUi1.abstract: "Shen Si" in Liu Xie's the Literary mind and Carving Dragon proposes the category of the image thoughts, not only treated as designing image, but also artistic image. Liu Xie deals with the creation of artistic image and its theoretical framework through imaginative thoughts. From the interaction between soul and nature, combination of form and mind, correspondence of language and sense, the complete framework for theoretical system of image thoughts is set up, and the artistic image foundation of philosophy and aesthetics theory are established.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Literature, Guangxi Normal University, Guilin , China

gGCZMumE.title: The Status and Influence of Lingui Poetry School in the late Qing Dynasty ——One of the Gui Studies on "Lingui Poetry School"
gGCZMumE.abstract: Lingui Poetry School,mainly made of Lingui Ci poets,led the schools of Ci poetry in the late Qing dynasty.Wang Pengyun and Kuang Zhouyi,leaders of it,aimed for the principle of Zhong Zhuo Da,constructed the Hui Feng Ci Hua theory system,laid the foundation for the school's achievements in creation and theory.Therefore,as well as Zhexi Poetry School and Changzhou Poetry School formed a situation of tripartite confrontation in the late dynasty.Then Lingui Poetry School surpassed the other two through continuous creation,made important impacts on Ci poetry,and for this established its status in the history of Ci poetry.
keywords: the four poets in the Qing dynasty

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Chinese Literature,Guangxi Normal University,Guilin,Guangxi ,China

vdAStwB5.title: On the Construction of Core Value Orientation of Concept of Honor and Disgrace in Literary Criticism
vdAStwB5.abstract: The construction of the core value system in literary criticism should take the social concept of honor and disgrace as an important content in the core value orientation and value system.The concept of honor and disgrace is not only a kind of value orientations in morality and ethics,but also in personal qualities.This concept,ancient or modern,Chinese or foreign,has always its own particularity and its own universality.The concept of honor and disgrace in ancient Chinese society centers on Confucian moral orientation,bearing impacts on the construction of social core value orientation,and on the establishment of ancient Chinese literature and literary criticism orientation.Through the standards of the true,the good,and the beautiful,literary criticism builds up the "Eight Honors and Eight Disgraces" appraisal value orientation,thus influencing and promoting the construction of the social concept of honor and disgrace in contemporary literary criticism.

authors.name: Zhang Liqun
authors.org: School of Chinese Language and Literature,Guangxi Normal University,Guilin,Guangxi

vdAStwB5.venue: Journal of Shandong Normal University(Humanities and Social Sciences)

qpqihG5k.title: On the Bian Zhilin's Poetic Creation in the Yan An Period——in the perspective of The Collection of Comforting and Appreciation Letters
qpqihG5k.abstract: From 1938 to 1939,Bian Zhilin had been visiting Yan An for a year.The life in Yan An was the enormous impact upon his creative writing,which was reflected in his work The Collection of Comforting and Appreciation Letters.The deepening of the realistic style,as contrasted with the expansion of the personal style of the previous modernists,as well as his remodeling of impersonality,etc.,formed the major features of the book.Meanwhile,such features also became the new logical starting point for the poet's resumption of a new creative journey.
keywords: The Collection of Comforting and Appreciation Letters

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Liaoning University,Shenyang,Liaoning ,China

qpqihG5k.venue: Journal of Changsha University of Science & Technology(Social Science)

gGOPGUf1.title: The Self-alienation of Female Consciousness in 1990s' Novels of Lin Bai
gGOPGUf1.abstract: Compared with the 1980s,the "personalization" tendency of 1990s' female literature is more obvious.As the leaders of women "personalization" writing,Lin bai's works reflect outstanding female position and female perspective.Unlike other female writers,Lin bai's female consciousness has emerged the alienation tendency.This is mainly manifested that Lin bai's novel is not only a simple "autobiography" of memories.It is piecing together memories of fragments in brains.The randomness of collage makes female consciousness detached.Lin bai gives her image of woman character of androgyny in two respects: male psyche and masculine conduct.The mysteriousness makes the female consciousness of her novel different from traditional female literature.It not only shows in the refusal and rebellion of mainstream discourse and grand narrative,but also quests existence of women's life forms instead of individual.We can research the location and dimensionality of female consciousness in female literature deeply by discussing the alienation of female consciousness in Lin bai's novel.

authors.name: SUN Jia
authors.org: Chinese Language and Literature School,Liaoning University,Shenyang Liaoning ,China

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Chinese Language and Literature School,Liaoning University,Shenyang Liaoning ,China

qkPHzVGZ.title: The Seventeen Years’ Poetry and Political Culture
qkPHzVGZ.abstract: As a literary phenomenon in a definite time, “the seventeen years’ poetry” undoubtedly had a close relationship with“politics”.However,the relationship should not be superficially dealt with whether in research or in literary history. Starting from the viewpoint of the theory of political caltare, the present paper analyses its 4 main aspects with the parpose of finding the questions through historical retrospection.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Cultural Propagation, Liaoning University, Shenyang , China

kYkB8AON.title: Change,Intervention and Self-identity——On YangSao's Poetry Writing in the 1930s
kYkB8AON.abstract: This essay focuses on YangSao's poetry writing in the 1930s with "change" clue in order to reveal the significance and value of this poet-YangSao in poetry writing.Analyzing his poems detailedly with artistic subject,style,form,theory and so on,we expect to enrich perpetual research on YangSao with a kind of Literary History Horizon.

authors.name: ZHANG li-qun
authors.org: Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

kYkB8AON.venue: Journal of Fujian Normal University(Philosophy and Social Sciences Edition)

3ZkJZ9IM.title: Classic "Heritage" and Its Cultural Implications——"Contemporary Acceptance" by Su Tong to Zhang Ailing's Novels
3ZkJZ9IM.abstract: As the classics inheritance process,Zhang Ailing's novels in the contemporary novel creation once had the material effect in the late 1980s.With the premises of unifying the writer identity,the family and dispirited,feminine and the human nature as well as the concrete creation techniques,Su Tong's "contemporary acceptance" of Zhang Ailing's novels always contain the more complex cultural connotation.The aim to compare the two generations will lead to developments of some literary and artistic spirit and the value of historical performance.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Literature,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

67MZ8Dzo.title: The cultural conservatism and its universal significance——on the poet Zheng Min’s mind in the 1990’s
67MZ8Dzo.abstract: The speech about new poetry tradition from Zheng Min,the poet and scholar,has brought forth the important effect.The speech,on the one hand has something with the cultural conservatism,on the other hand,it inevitably reflects the context of the popular introspection.Basing on the speech,giving an explain on the phenomenon from the mind,hoping a fruitful chscussion on the debate and many historical questions of the new poetry can be made.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Cultural Propagation,Liaoning University,Shen yang ,China

67MZ8Dzo.venue: Journal of Qingdao University of Science and Technology(Social Sciences)

Y3MqrHUK.title: On the New Poetry Inheriting in the 50's from the Late Yan'an Poetry
Y3MqrHUK.abstract: During the process of"inheriting" the creation resources of the late Yan'an poetry,new poetry presents a variety of contents in the fifties of the twentieth century.In addition to institution,team,production and acceptance,the corresponding extension of style and form also affects the appearance of the 50's Poetry to a large extent.However,"inheritance" in this article is only a relative concept.50's Poetry has been having their potential contents in their own development process,and its being"simple"process is a complex part in the process of the continuation of history.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-Qun
authors.org: College of Literature,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

dnbPT3DE.title: The time,space and life and the Chinese writing of the oriental wisdom——On the "Chinese Cultural Poetics" of the poem Ren hong yuan
dnbPT3DE.abstract: The scholar Ren Hong Yuan is one of the relatively unique poets in the contemporary poetry.His unique text stems from its unique concept to a large extent.Premising on the confirmation of the Ren Hong yuan's poetry and its theory contemporary poetry bringing important revelation,to rethinking and read on the "Oriental wisdom",poetry and the tradition,the space-time status and life writing,the chinese character and cultural connotation,the poetics reconstruction and its historical care,is just the important characteristics and components of the Ren Hong yuan's Chinese cultural poetics.The above-mentioned aspects not only consists in the historical composition of Ren Hong Yuan's poetry concept,but also endows the status of poets and has a contemporary significance to the Contemporary Poetry with upgrading the theoretical height and expanding the space of the writing.

authors.name: SHI Shi-ping
authors.org: Tianjin academy of social sciences,Tianjin ,China

lyD3OtAa.title: From the Angles of"History"and"Narrative"——on the Research Questions of the New History Novel
lyD3OtAa.abstract: Since the beginning of the New History Novel,there have been some disputes over a series of questions such as its name and identity.These disputes were not only closely related to its uncertain connotation and extension,but also its cognitive viewpoint and theory transformation.This paper,from the viewpoints of the concept analyzing and stage evolving,gradually analyzes the questions of"History"and"Narrative".In view of the external theory,the research of the new history novel in China has to focus on its narrative latitude and history relations etc.These will become the logical starting point to the understanding of phenomenon.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Liaoning University,Shenyang,,Liaoning,China

lyD3OtAa.venue: Journal of Ningbo Radio & TV University

Zgq8qsIs.title: Searching for Nature and its Branches Growing Downward:on Lu Weiping's Poems
Zgq8qsIs.abstract: The poet Lu Weiping has set an important example in the course of the "bottom writing","dagong poems",etc.(as popular terms)in the poetic circles in the early 21st century.Based on the comprehensive study of Lu Weiping’s life experiences,exploring his creativity through the way of searching for the nature and the branches growing downward would be of an important cognitive significance on the above named and even the trend.Of course,this topic by itself covers much.This paper discusses not only the pursuit of the nature of Lu Wei-ping’s poetry,but also the specific content of his pursuit.And the branches downward will be just the iconicity to reflect the special characteristic and speaking value of Lu Weiping’s writing.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Arts,Liaoning University,Shenyang,Liaoning ,China

GdSuZvsG.title: Extension and Variation of the Modernity——the Concept of the Third Generation Poetry
GdSuZvsG.abstract: Acting as a rapid poetry movement in the eighties of the 20th century, the third generation poetry has attracted many people's attention with its rebel gesture.In a sense,the emerging of the third generation poetry indicates that the Chinese poetry has developed into the postmodernism.However,there were some historical problems not to clear up for the third generation hurriedly from A to Z.The paper will discuss its beginning under the historical context and its characteristic.At the same time,connecting to the main groups' ideas it will scrutinize it from three aspects of "idea transforming","historical showing" and "modernity in the postmodern context".

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Cultural Spreading School,Liaoning University,Shenyang Liaoning ,China

gMdrp9FB.title: The viewpoint of entering the history——on the narrative point of view about the new history novel
gMdrp9FB.abstract: Since the new history novel appearing,there has been a controversy about its name,identification and so on.The phenomenon not only has close relation to its indeterminate connotation and extension,but also to its special structure.In view of these facts,the text,based on its background,interprets the three main aspects,namely,the view of first person and the history take place simultaneity,the focalization altering and the feeling deducing,and the folk field and its spot applying.The above construct the important clue about the text.

authors.name: ZHANG li-qun
authors.org: Literature Institute,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

gMdrp9FB.venue: Journal of Qingdao University of Science and Technology(Social Sciences)

T1g17Vkv.title: A Parallel Comparative Study on Writers Lin Bai and Chen Ran in their 1990’s
T1g17Vkv.abstract: The female writings represented by Lin Bai and Chen Ran have significant impact on the literature in the 1990’s.The phenomenon is not only related to their life experiences and gender awareness,but also related to the space provided by literature.To identify the features of the creations by the two writers,the article conducts a parallel comparative study in five areas to research the differences and similarities between them,the personalized writing and the Chinese contemporary female literature since the 90's,etc.

w33sVDDa.title: The historical integrity and the convergence of the Chinese and Western Poetics
w33sVDDa.abstract: The historical integrity is the basic principles and point of view of the modern literary study made by the scholar and poet Wai-lim Yip.Its main purpose is to emphasize the converge of the diachronic and synchronic state on the cross-cultural perspective in the process of the historical context of the reunification of things.Premised on the three main hands of the spread of the modernist poetry in modern Chinese context,the converge of the modern poetry and classical poetry and the language of modern Chinese poetry and the "self" specifically,we shall roughly sketch the general outline of Wai-lim Yip 's theory of the modern poetry.As to the meaning,it wll be in its ability to provide the inspiration and path for the development of modern poetry.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Chinese Literature College,Liaoning University,Shen Yang,

authors.org: Dancing Department,People's Liberation Army Institute of Arts,Beijing,

mymBlDXl.title: The History Deflating and Restructuring——on the Novel of the Hometown Series by Liu ZhenYun
mymBlDXl.abstract: The novel of the hometown series by Liu ZhenYun has had the important status on his writing path.Speaking of the concrete texts,the novel not only has presented the new historical idea,but also has presented the brand-new creature technique.On the bottom of the 4 hands,including the vanguard extending and the theme choosing,the history and the folk back to original state,the language game and the form restructuring as well as the local disassimilating,the novel has been bringing us the brand-new narration.
keywords: the novel of the hometown series

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Chinese and Literature,Liaoning University,Shenyang Liaoning ,China

cdRpqLqK.title: A Research on Ke Zhongping's Poetry Creation in Yanan Period
cdRpqLqK.abstract: Ke Zhongping is one of those famous poets who came to Yanan earlier.His poetry creation and theory had a great influence on literary creation in Yanan.Using the way of poetic researching to study his creation and theory,there are several characteristics can be concluded:extreme enthusiasm fitting for the environment in Yanan;movements about poetry reading and poetry on-street;narrative poems about new famers and workers;discussions and practice for the nationalization and massification of poetry creation.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Arts,Liaoning University,Shenyang,Liaoning ,China;School of Arts,Shandong Normal University,Jinan,Shandong ,China

X0jfRjx8.title: A Dream of the Red Mansions and Duanmu Hongliang's Literay Creation
X0jfRjx8.abstract: There was a deep historical origin between Duanmu Hongliang(Cao Hanwen as his real name)and A Dream of the Red Mansions.He had grown up in the process of reading A Dream of the Red Mansions,and had a strong love for it.He had probed into it throughout his life and gave his original views.Therefore,both ideas and skills of his creation had been deeply affected by A Dream of the Red Mansions.His unfinished novel Cao Xueqin could be considered his achievements on A Dream of the Red Mansions in his lifetime.
keywords: A Dream of the Red Mansions

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun

tlZec6bi.title: Mu Mu-tian:from the "Modern" to "Reality" of the Poet
tlZec6bi.abstract: From 20 to 30 agin the 20th century,Mu Mu-tian's change of the theory and creation is the history of modern Chinese literature from the "modern" to "reality" of a special case.Take Mu Mu-tian the biography.the creation and the theory position as foundations,from the heart and writing of the right,we can see changes in Mu Mu-tian poet not only with his feelings on the north-east,and this shift also contains a language of different cultures Habitat under the right poet.

authors.name: Wang chun-Hui

Q8OZZxhn.title: Witnessing History and Decoding Life:on He Qifang's Personality Decoding by Zhao Siyun
Q8OZZxhn.abstract: He Qifang's Personality Decoding by Zhao Siyun is the research with the features of a chronicle according to He Qifang's life.In terms of personality analysis and multiple methods,Zhao reveals He's transformation by combing the text and life interpretation,reads the "mirror" of the intellectuals' evolution.Zhao siyun's study brings us revelations and meditations about both academic research and life.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Literature School,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,Liaoning

Q8OZZxhn.venue: Journal of Chongqing Three Gorges University

LpBR5sHk.title: The joint of the history and literature——the reflection on the contemporary literature and its history writing
LpBR5sHk.abstract: Along with the slogan"rewriting the literature",the contemporary literature writing has been a hot spot topic .However,the contemporary literature writing has been the historical as the alteration and the challenge to the writer.The text will rethink its history writing under the current situation and the contemporary literature history reference.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Literature,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

LpBR5sHk.venue: Journal of Qingdao University of Science and Technology(Social Sciences)

6YqApgQA.title: The Evolution of the "Collective Consciousness" and the Composition in the History of the Chinese New Poetry
6YqApgQA.abstract: The "collective consciousness",as one of the important concepts of traditional Chinese culture,has an important value in the process of development of a century new poetry.The historical experience shows us that the "collective consciousness" is growing and declining in the history and has always been related to the cultural contexts and its change.Moreover,in the process of determining the levels of the new poetry,the "collective consciousness" has become one of the most important tasks to reflect it.Therefore,under the premise of the value and the concept,it is important to interpret the new poetry of the "collective consciousness" in the history of the composition from the historical relation,the overall trend and the style.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Liberal Arts,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

6YqApgQA.venue: Journal of Hebei University of Science and Technology(Social Sciences)

vzKsWoUo.title: The dialectical comprehensiveness under the postmodern echoing and the real context——the Inspection on the present cultural studies in China
vzKsWoUo.abstract: The cultural studies,acting as the rapidly rising research paradigm at the end of the 20th,has been one of the activest fields at present.In a sense,as an interdisciplinary research the cultural studies have played a tremendous role in promoting the status of the contemporary Chinese culture study and the cultural identity of the third-world At the same time,it has launched the unprecedented impact and challenges on the traditional academic disciplines and the academic formation.The article will focus on the cultural studies in the impact of criticism and meaning with the postmodern echoing for clues.This could include specific details on the "reality of Context","rule" and "academic politics," "popular culture" of the four main aspects of the study and reading.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Liaoning University,Shenyang,

2vQnxqrJ.title: Starting from the history and narrative——outlining on the research questions of the new history
2vQnxqrJ.abstract: The new history novel has been some quarrels about a series of questions such as name and identity. The phenomenon producing had closely related not only its indeterminate connotation and extension, but also its cognitive viewpoint and theory altering .The text will begin to analyze the concept and describe the stage, and gradually enter the question of the history and narrative. In view of the external theory, we think the research of the new history novel in China has to pay attend to the relation with the narrative and history, etc. These will become the logical starting point to the phenomenon.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Chinese Language and Literature,Liaoning University, Shenyang 10036, China

2vQnxqrJ.venue: Journal of Qingdao University of Science and Technology(Social Sciences)

x1Am9z92.title: Predicament & Postmodernism of Female Individual Writing in the 90s
x1Am9z92.abstract: The female individual writing in the 90s is one of the hot topics in Chinese literary at the end of the last century.Based on the Western feminism,this writing became a forceful challenge to male authority;and as a voice from the female itself,this is of significant importance in the pioneering practice.However,it has met with predicaments after a period of prosperity due to the cultural differences between the West and the East,the surface understanding of the Western feminism as well as the publishing factors.This paper displays the predicament by showing the common elements between the female individual writing and postmodernism,the purpose of which is to make the female individual writing become real Chinese women's literature.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Liaoning University,Shenyang ,Liaoning,China

x1Am9z92.venue: Journal of Ningbo Radio & TV University

mCAE82Mb.title: Change of New Poetry Form and Historical Analysis——A Case of New Folk Song Movement in 1958
mCAE82Mb.abstract: The problem of the new poetry form has always been a focus of heated discussions.At the same time,it has been one of the focuses which may lead to the argument.By showing a case of the New Folk Song Movement in 1958,this paper analyzes the classical and modern changes of the viewpoints of the political cultures,reflects their history,and then reaches a conclusion.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun

Nau1kDdo.title: A Discussion on Verse from the 1980s to 1990s
Nau1kDdo.abstract: Compared with the boom of verse in the 1980s,the verse of the 1990s often impresses readers with a feeling of "division" owing to the external environment and its internal artistic features.This paper aims to reinterpret this sort of viewpoint marked by experience so as to straighten out some new phenomena and conclusions.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Cultural Communication,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

Nau1kDdo.venue: Journal of Hainan Normal University(Social Sciences)

8nE1sTRh.title: Possibility of Opposition and Mixture——On the Relationship between Modern Poetry and Lyrics from Phenomenon
8nE1sTRh.abstract: Modern poetry and lyrics are often regarded as two categories owing to their respective characteristics,which originates their opposition.However,they're closely related and can be integrated considering their origin and musicality.At the same time,problems existing in the modern poetry and the lyrics have prompted the trend of the merger since 1990s.This discussion,on the premise of the opposition and mixture,is to find conjunction point of their mutual development for modern poetry and lyrics.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Liaoning University,Shenyang,,Liaoning,China

8nE1sTRh.venue: Journal of Ningbo Radio & TV University

cYZHnGJm.title: Damage of deoxyribounucleic acid(DNA)underUltrasonic irradiation catalyzed by titanium dioxide(TiO_2)with different crystal phases
cYZHnGJm.abstract: The damage of deoxyribounucleic acid(DNA)under ultrasonic irradiation in the presence of titanium dioxide(TiO2)was studied by ultraviolet-visible(UV-Vis)and fluorescence spectroscopy, and the catalytic performance of rutile and anatase TiO2 was compared. Furthermore, the influence of ultrasonic irradiation time,TiO2 addition amount, solution acidity, ultrasound power, ionic kind and strength on the damage of DNA were also discussed. The results showed thst the catalytic perfor-mance of urtile TiO2 was evidently better than that of anatase TiO2 It was found that under a certain condition the damage degree of DNA molecule was aggravated with the increase of ultrasonic irradia-tion time,ultrasound power and TiO2addition amount,but weakened with the inerease of solution acid-ity. However,the influences of ionic kind and strength were different. The research results are of great significance for driving ultrasonic irradiation catalyzed by TiO2 to treat tumour in clinic application.
cYZHnGJm.venue: Journal of Bohai University(Natural Science Edition)

0w7TyQHj.title: On He Qifang's Poet Mind and His Creation Road in Yan'an
0w7TyQHj.abstract: He Qi-fang has been considering the issue of intellectual transformation after he reached Yan'an in 1938,which means bidding farewell to the past and reflecting a sincere repentance in his attitude and creation process.This paper probes his honesty,contradictions,anxiety,as well as the psychological implication of singing and sighing by focusing on Night Song,his representative creation in this period.The honesty,the serious inferior mentality and the repentance consciousness expressed in Night Song make him become the tragedy type of the writers community during the war.In the late period of Yan'an,He Qi-fang turns from the poet of the pursuit of literary beauty to the political obedient.At last,He Qi-fang chooses temporarily to stop writing as his change.The blank of his creating even arises the proposition of He Qi-fang phenomenon in the literary history so that He Qi-fang becomes a typical writer during the contemporary literature.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Literature School,Liaoning University,Shenyang Liaoning ,China

0UPl3HXc.title: The continuance,conversion and historical identity of pioneers——a comparative study between SuTong and Bi Feiyu
0UPl3HXc.abstract: As the writers who have attracted the literary world's attention since the Pioneer Literature began,Su Tong and Bi Feiyu belong to literary stages of 1980s and 1990s respectively,but they have common ground in many aspects,which lead to the fact that they can be studied as the representative writers of contemporary Chinese literature since Pioneer Literature.After studying their living space and creative working,we get to know that their common ground includes: how to get involved in the historical narration,how to show writing skills and writing themes,and how to adapt to the conversion of writing for the age,which is the possibility to prove the literary history.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-Qun
authors.org: College of Liberal Arts,Liao Ning University,Shenyang ,China

4pobthwX.title: The Flow and Magic in the Narration——on the Pioneer Spirit of Hai Nan’s Poetic Language
4pobthwX.abstract: Hai Nan,as one of the relatively unique poets in the contemporary poetry,to a large extent,owes her unique text to its unique language.In the name of the vanguard spirit,the language features of Hai Nan’s poetry both include the relationship between words and objects,and the flow and imaginative writing in the narration,in addition to the unique language orientations.

authors.name: ZHANG li-qun

3YXCR3rF.title: On Han Zuorong’s Poetic Creation Road since 1986
3YXCR3rF.abstract: Two shifts had happened since 1986 in the creative road of Han Zuorong,a contemporary famous poet of China.The first was the language conversion on parting from the past creation;the second was the speechless condition and living freedom since 1990s.The two made a transition in his creative course from 1980s to 1990s.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Arts,Liaoning University,Shenyang,Liaoning ,China

Ygx6AFih.title: On the Text Presenting of the Historical Narratives——about the Language Features of the"New Historical Fiction"
Ygx6AFih.abstract: New historical novels have seen arguments over issues like the naming and its identity.The phenomenon arises not only from its indefinite connotations and extensions,but also from its special language.In view of these facts,the text first discusses the background of the novels.Then,through the three main areas on the nature of language,further explores the new content of its cognitive development.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Liaoning University,Shenyang,Liaoning,China,

Ygx6AFih.venue: Journal of Guangdong Radio & Television University

TRi6hKvb.title: Life-returning Language:on the Writing Tendency of Contemporary Poetry——An Example of the Ren Hongyuan's Poetry and Theory
TRi6hKvb.abstract: The scholar Ren Hongyuan is one of the relatively unique poets in the contemporary poetic circle.To a large extent,the peculiarity of the text stems from his unique concept.On the premise of confirmation that Ren Hongyuan's poetry and theory give important inspiration to the contemporary poetry,it forms important characteristics and parts of his poetry and theory to rethink the new poetry and the tradition,the specificity of the language and the fitting of language and life.The abovementioned aspects not only consist of the historical composition of Ren Hongyuan's poetric concept,but also reveal his status and significance in the specific description.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Liaoning University,Shenyang,,Liaoning,China

TRi6hKvb.venue: Journal of Ningbo Radio & TV University

ekcWWzeb.title: Mirror and Reality——Reflection on the Phenomenon of the"Poetry Ethics"at the Beginning of the 21st Century
ekcWWzeb.abstract: With the theory research and new quality appearing in the Chinese poetry at the beginning of the 21st century,the issue of the"poetry' s ethics"had been highlighted.This is a phenomenon beyond the past writing,and a necessity of the stress of responsibility on the basis of reality.The paper,by examining the phenomenon and the relationship between writing(mirror) and reality(image),as well as the artistic reality,reflects,under the historical and realistic premise,its occurrence,development and makes corresponding value judgment,whose purpose is to direct the research to a broader and deeper theoretical space.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Liaoning University,Shenyang ,Liaoning,China

ekcWWzeb.venue: Journal of Ningbo Radio & TV University

F9KemNbA.title: On Liang Zongdai's "Pure Poetry" Theory
F9KemNbA.abstract: Liang Zongdai's "Pure Poetry" theory plays an important role in the history of Chinese modern poetry,which is not only due to his life but also his creative works.The paper discusses his "Pure Poetry" theory from three main aspects and it also pays attention to the effects of the external world on the theory,so as to clarify the abundance and native color of his theory.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Liaoning University,Shenyang ,Liaoning,China

F9KemNbA.venue: Journal of Ningbo Radio & TV University

LBT63HwO.title: Symbiosis of History and Era and Its Writing Orientation——On the Narrative Idea of New Historical Novel
LBT63HwO.abstract: The new historical novel has caused debates concerning its name and orientation.The phenomenon is closely related to its special narrative idea.Based on the birth of the new historical novel and new historical understanding,the paper will discuss the specific texts from different perspectives,which constitute an important way to analyze its narrative idea.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Humanities,Liaoning University,Shenyang,Liaoning ,China

bRMxGTtn.title: Pioneer of "Drifting"——"Historic Narration" of Su Tong's Works
bRMxGTtn.abstract: "Historic narration" of Su Tong's works is with striking artistic feature.As the deduction of the concept,Su Tong's "historic narration" presents the influence of the regional culture on the literary creation.The multi-significance of the theme represents the cycling of the structure and symbolic meanings.The "drifting" of the "historical" narration at last makes Su Tong's creation into the existent circumstance and the level of personality analysis.And all this,on one hand,enlightens the readers and at the same time is the tendency of the contemporary fiction of 1980s and 1990s.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Cultural Propagation,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,Liaoning,China

bRMxGTtn.venue: Journal of Jianghan University(Humanities Science Edition)

DTSFRWXS.title: Writers' Self-identity and Readers' Acceptance——An Interpretation of "Lu Yao Phenomenon"
DTSFRWXS.abstract: "Lu Yao phenomenon" has been one of hot researches in recent years,its basic contents involving the writing of the literary history,the status quo of Lu Yao's studies and readers' reading universally noted in the academic circles.In line with contemporary changes in realism creation,an exploration and analysis is made of the cognition of Lu Yao's duty as a writer and his writing mentality as well as of the spread and the acceptance level of his works,which is just an important approach to interpreting "Lu Yao phenomenon"

authors.name: ZHANG li-qun
authors.org: College of Liberal Arts,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

DTSFRWXS.venue: Journal of Hainan Normal University(Social Sciences)

K7HbdEYC.title: On the Revaluation of the Modernist literature in the 1980s
K7HbdEYC.abstract: The emergence of the "Modernism",a special appellation,has caused a strong and lasting impact in the literary circle in 1980’ s."Modernism" significantly influenced the literature in the 80’s and the Chinese contemporary literature since then,but the origin,development and value contain many complex historical problems.Under the logic of revealing "modern transition" the author considers it worthwhile and significant to study the method of historical analysis,the emergence of "Modernism",the logic of "opening up",the generation of "history" and the revaluation of value.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun

IYXs68Hs.title: The Knowledge Logic of Network Poetry
IYXs68Hs.abstract: As a new form of media,the network poetry has already been a splendid sight because of the rapid spread of the internet in more than a decade.The evaluation of the network poetry has gradually changed from intuitive comment into the rational thinking and theoretical study.The network poetry has its own development logic,and there is an entry point which provides us a new perspective to research network poetry,that is,the advances in technology,postmodern culture and consumer context.

ZiiuRW15.title: On the Special Structure of "the New Novel about History"
ZiiuRW15.abstract: "The New Novel about History" has evoked controversy since its birth.This phenomenon is closely related not only to its indeterminate connotation and extension,but also to its special structure.In view of these facts,this paper attempts to discuss its historical background and interpret the three main aspects of the special structure,thereby deepening the study of "the New Novel about History".

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Arts,Liaoning University,Shenyang,Liaojing ,China

hxSehsuv.title: Existence Consciousness and Its Writing Direction——The historical tendency of Chinese poetry since the 1990s
hxSehsuv.abstract: As a general trend of Chinese literature since the 1990s,the consciousness of existence is a product of both writing transform and literature's moving towards the reality.Under this pre-condition,the historical tendency of Chinese poetry since the 1990s has also caught the existence theme.However,as a literary case and a unique style,the new form of poetry has its own characteristics.Based on the analysis of the new elements in the poetry of the early 21st century,the thesis will discuss the historical tendency of Chinese poetry since the 1990s in five aspects and review some hot issues and unresolved matters.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Literature,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

hxSehsuv.venue: Journal of Liaoning University(Philosophy and Social Sciences Edition)

BkJ9NMB4.title: A Discussion on Current "Criteria for Verse"
BkJ9NMB4.abstract: The criterion for new verse has always been an important topic in the study of new verse history as well as the "basis" for the existence of new verse.In order to better grasp the limits and variability of criteria for new verse,an attempt is made to explore the modern meaning of the issue in a dynamic manner by reviewing history and clarifying concepts.As the features and changes of new verse have been within the historical space of its existence,the key logical starting point for establishing "criteria for new verse" should,besides a positive attitude towards history,lie in due attention to the morality of verse writing,its external pattern of cognition and to the complex plysemy of standardization for new verse.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Liberal Arts,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

BkJ9NMB4.venue: Journal of Hainan Normal University(Social Sciences)

5AeOe5l3.title: Speechlessness and exploration in writing under the political ittegration Context——on the "phenomenon of He Qi Fang" again
5AeOe5l3.abstract: In order to throughout reveal the "phenomenon of He Qi Fang",the text will act on the mind by the cultural context.Therefore,it have to be an important way on the speechlessness and exploration on the base of the all one's life and career.And the way will serve the poem He Qi Fang as well as serve the type of the poem mind in the 20th by analogy.

authors.name: WANG Chun-hui
authors.org: ShiHeZi University,ShiHeZi ,China

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

lCG230lG.title: After Sex Evolving and Main Body back——Discussing on the "Body Phenomenon" of the Poetical Works in the New Era
lCG230lG.abstract: The "body writing" or "body phenomenon" is one of the hot theoretical issues in the academic field of the 1990s.It not only consists of various writing types,but also contains the sexal,body and morality factors.This paper comes to the topic by reviewing poetical works composed in the new era,and then probes into this issue from the sexual viewpoint,re-flection on the status quo and evolution prediction by combining the contents such as the history development,the social reality and the theory upgrading.

authors.name: Zhang Li-qun
authors.org: Liaoning University,Shenyang, Liaoning,China

lCG230lG.venue: Journal of Ningbo Radio & TV University

pVNfmDph.title: The Extension of Narrating in the Maze and Time——A Comparative Study on Borges' and Ge fei's novels
pVNfmDph.abstract: The young writer Ge Fei has been rated as one of the pioneer writers for his uniqueness,which is related largely to the unique concept and appearance of his novel.On the other hand,from the viewpoint of foreign cultural resources,he accepted the performance of Borges.From the extension of the logic with their creation,this paper discusses the influence of Borges on Ge fei’s novels from identity of writing concept,maze approach and unique sense of time.Ge Fei’s position of pure literature in the 1990’s novels can be seen as a result of the extension.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Arts,Liaoning University,Shenyang,Liaoning ,China

5HMmWTCY.title: The Potential Resources of the Folk Song and the Natural Poems Taking Poet Liu Ban-nong's State of Mind and the Writing Choice for Example
5HMmWTCY.abstract: Regarding a folk song as a creative resource had been a major impact on the birth period of the modern poetry,and had been through the history of modern poetry.Of course,depending on the songs has something to do with a poet's personality and preference-related.The text will mainly analyze the poet Liu Ban-nong's mentality and the creative way into the topic.Involved in the life of the foundation,the pursuit of realism,the form of the practice and the language right of a total of 4 aspects,and the text are expected to answer the questions on all kinds of relations and the value of gains and losses between the folk song and the poetry,and the way about the vertical history and the specific case will be said on the rich and specific statement.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Literature,Liaoning University,Shenyang,Liaoning ,China

5HMmWTCY.venue: Journal of China University of Petroleum(Edition of Social Sciences)

UBMUozFs.title: The Post-modernity in China's Films Since 1990s
UBMUozFs.abstract: As a specific historical stage of cultural character,the post-modernity has exerted a profound impact on China's films since 1990s.The post-modernity of China's films since 1990s has reflected not only in the aspect of subverting the traditional thinking of the mainland movie,values,and removing the aesthetic depth in the process of business operation,but also in the aspect of rewriting and imitating Stephen Chow's"nonsense"films.It also includes Wang Jia-wei's films and the changes of China's films from formalism to technical supremacy and the formation of the disappearance of the main and the virtual mirror at the beginning of the 21st century.The above-mentioned aspects manifest the evolution of the film's post-modern stage in China,and its various artistic constituents as a whole.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: Literature School,Liaoning University,Shenyang Liaoning ,China

pyLTeAxS.title: The Vanguard Continuity,Interpretation of Narrative and Historicize——On the "Historical Narrative" by Bi Feiyu
pyLTeAxS.abstract: As one of the unique narrative types in the "new generation" writers,the "historical narrative" by Bi Feiyu has provided the important illustration to inspect the inheritance and continuity of experience of the vanguard literary in the 1990's.Based on the background and the writer's idea,and from the topic,technique,experience and human nature of Bi Feiyu's creation,this field can not only confirm the connection of the literary history,but also show the change and expansion.Bi Feiyu's creation has brought the vitality and provided the new experience in the process of history.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: School of Literature,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

pyLTeAxS.venue: Journal of Hebei University of Science and Technology(Social Sciences)

J4Kkhj5O.title: The Individual Personality and"the Anxiety of the Times"——On Mu Dan’s Poetic Mentalities from 1930s to 1950s
J4Kkhj5O.abstract: In order to thoroughly reveal the poet Mu Dan’s mentalities in the context of modern society and political culture,the paper introduces"the anxiety of the times"as the basic background to analyze Mu Dan’s individual personality,i.e.his poetic mentalities,based on the self image in his poems from 1930s to 1950s and on the poet himself during that period.This research method not only applies to Mu Dan,but also to other poets in the twentieth century.

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Literature,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

authors.name: LIU Xian-long
authors.org: College of Literature,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

J4Kkhj5O.venue: Journal of Liaoning University(Philosophy and Social Sciences Edition)

zoyGgNE3.title: The Antinomy of the Function and Aesthetics——The values of the political culture studying on the Chinese new poetry
zoyGgNE3.abstract: Acting as the antinomy,the function and aesthetics has been an important aspect of the aesthetic ideology in the study of literature.At the same time,it has also been a valuable part in the study of literature and politics.The paper will mainly discuss the values of the political culture and the complex historical connection,so as to expand the space of the discussion in the process of historical reflection.
keywords: the values of the political culture

authors.name: ZHANG Li-qun
authors.org: College of Literature,Liaoning University,Shenyang ,China

zoyGgNE3.venue: Journal of Liaoning University(Philosophy and Social Sciences Edition)

HKNcRxrY.title: Producing and Handing Down——on the Contemporary Literature Classics
HKNcRxrY.abstract: The contemporary literature classics are created in the particular period.It has kept in constant touch with political culture context in the beginning,and also,during the different background,the evolution of the contemporary literature classics has distinguished in front and behind.Then,if we can link with the marketization in the 90's,we shall find some question to think it over.The text will discuss the question from three hands on the bottom of the contemporary literature classics' producing and handing down,dialectical relation in the literature classics with the literary history classics and literature of reflection. As for the contemporary literature which is on the road of classics,the problem is how to surpass the historical limitations so as to produce and find classics in the process of its development.Only in this way,can contemporary literature classics be recognized by the readers under the concern of the reality,and the new classics in the meaning of literature history will come into being and hand down.

ZiHxe4S4.title: The Selection and Education of New Poems
ZiHxe4S4.abstract: This article,starting from the current selection of new poems,analyzes the history and the current situation of new poetry education,and,based on the problems discovered,discusses the way of teaching new poetry as well as the future of new poetry education.

bSCtaDF1.title: Sonacatalytic degradation of methyl parathion pesticide in the presence of rutile TiO_2 catalyst
bSCtaDF1.abstract: A variety of affecting factors on ultrasonic degradation of methyl parathion were studied adopting the ordinary rutile TiO2 after being activated at high temperature.The results indicate that the effects of ultrasonic degradation are more obvious in the presence of rutile TiO2 than those under the one fold ultrasound.The ultrasonic degradation kinetics of methyl parathion in the presence of rutile TiO2 catalyst follows first-order reaction.The degradation ratio of methyl parathion surpasses 95% within 60 min under the experimental conditions as follows: ultrasonic frequency of 40 kHz,output power of 50 W,catalyst amount of 1 000 mg·L-1,pH of 5.00,temperature of 20 ℃ and initial methyl parathion concentration of 50.0 mg·L-1.

uPZ9YY50.title: A Discussion on Han Shaogong's Novel Creation Road
uPZ9YY50.abstract: Han Shaogong regards writing as the way to spiritual home.With his thirty years literary works,Han Shaogong has kept in learning,innovating and using all kinds of creative methods,and has written a series of excellent works.His literary works have changed from "Educated Youth Literature" to "Root Seeking Literature",then from exploring literary style and "New Country Literature" at the beginning of the century.Han Shaogong guides the direction of thinking and writing boom in literature field.Analyzing Han Shaogong's novel creating is an indispensable aspect of understanding his personal and the whole literature development.

bpj42QNS.title: On the “Post-modernity” of Vanguard Novel
bpj42QNS.abstract: As a unique narrative text in the Chinese contemporary fiction, the Vanguard Novel adopts the post-modern techniques in the narration as its main artistic feature. However, this post-modern approach is achieved through reference and imitation. Therefore, it should not be considered as totally “post-modern” narrative, but similar to it in nature. Such being the premise, the main purpose of this paper is to draw from the Advanced Novel the phases in the post-modern Chinese literature and their characteristics.

g0UyS9Vt.title: A Common Interpretation of Bi Shumin’s Fiction
g0UyS9Vt.abstract: In recent years,Bi Shumin has made important achievements in her novels,which in turn promotes the research of her.The paper studies her fiction from the perspective of the common features in her creation,attempting to introduce a creative approach to her research and literature review.

H1JnWXB8.title: On the National Theme of the New Poetry in the 1980s
H1JnWXB8.abstract: Under the inspiration of thematology,the national theme mainly involves literary theme,subject matter,image and so on.And it can grasp the relationship between literature,history,culture and society from the perspectives of categorization,individuation,personalized and dynamic.In the light of literary history,the national theme of the new poetry in the 1980s has been more meaningful to the present the transitional period.Based on the context of the new poetry in the 1980s adequately,the discussions of the expressions and connotations of the national theme of the new poetry in that particular historical period from several aspects,may provide the case of reference,in the process of redrawing the atlas of the new poetry in the 1980s for the research of national theme of the Chinese New poetry.

bhejyXVw.title: On the Evolution Form of Poetry Tide in the 80's
bhejyXVw.abstract: Because of the change of the century as well as its own glorious situation,the study of literature in the 80's has been paid more attention to,and the research has gone deep into gradually the various branches of the literature.The article mainly chooses the evolution form of poetry tide as the clue.After clearing the generation of the poetry in the 80's and its living conditions,we discuss the issue from several aspects including the controversy,creative bodies,artistic evolution and the formation of multi-pattern.It is the logical structure to solve the complex issues in this text.

wMi33wSG.title: On the Mysticism Trend of the Ge fei's Novel
wMi33wSG.abstract: The young writer Ge fei had been classified avant-garde because of the special narrate in his novel.The feature had something to do with not only Ge fei's idea of his novel,but also his special narrate itself.The text will begin to discuss the Ge fei's novel from the mysticism trend.We will draw the conclusion on the myth and its absorbing on the four hands including the idea transforming,vacancy and break,speculum and labyrinth and lasting in the writing.

authors.org: Liaoning University,Shen Yang ,China

m5Vp1fiY.title: The Predicament of Female Personalized Writing and its Post-Modernism in the 1990s
m5Vp1fiY.abstract: The female personalized writing in the 1990s is the hot point topic of Chinese literary world at the end of the last century.On the basis of western feminism,the female personalized writing launches a strong challenge to the male authority through its peculiar texts,and cries out the female sound of self.Therefore this kind of practice has its own practical significance.However,because of the mistakes and variation in acceptance of the western feminism,the female writers expect too much on the road of western feminism in seeking Chinese female emancipation,leading to the confliction with Chinese traditional culture.Although there exists the difference!between the value orientations before and after the 1990s,they all have the characteristics of modernity,which is the reason of the predicament.First,it is the puzzlement of the deconstruction of the post-modernity,then comes the self-concentration of the mode of post-modernity and finally is the spiritual puzzlement of post-modernity.All the female writers including the personalized writers should look squarely at themselves,face the reality,pay attention to the reality and life and find their writing position which belongs to them so that they can realize the unity of the reality and the personality.Only in this way can they get rid of the writing predicament of female personalized writing.

z3IMtOhq.title: Analyses on the true view of Bi Shumin's writing
z3IMtOhq.abstract: The foundation of Bi Shumin's literary thought is the truth,and authenticity is the backbone of the Bi Shumin theatrical ideas and literary activities.This article analyzes Bi Shumin's true view from her pursuit for authenticity,performance and limitations,and it will help us deepen the understanding of the Bi Shumin's creations.

HCkymlTR.title: A new system for the amplification of biological signals: RecA and complimentary single strand DNA probes on a leaky surface acoustic wave biosensor.
HCkymlTR.abstract: This research describes a new amplification signals system of the leaky surface acoustic wave (LSAW) bis-peptide nucleic acid (bis-PNA) biosensor for the simple, sensitive and rapid detection of the target double-stranded DNA (dsDNA). The system consists of a RecA protein-coated complementary single-stranded DNA (cssDNA) probe complex that amplifies the biological signal to improve the sensitivity of the biosensor. The bis-PNA probe for detecting HPV was first immobilized on a gold surface membrane of the detection channel. After the probe was completely hybridized with the corresponding target DNA, different concentrations of the "RecA protein-complementary single strand DNA probe" were added to react with the bis-PNA/dsDNA complex. The phase shift of the LSAW biosensors, which was measured and found to be most significant when the RecA protein was 45 μg/mL and the ATPγS was 2.5 mmol/L. Compared with other concentrations (P<0.01) of RecA and ATPγS, the value of the phase shift was (11.74 ± 1.03) degrees and the ratio of the phase shift and hybridization time clearly outperformed that of the other concentrations. Compared to the direct hybridization of the bis-PNA probe and the target DNA sequence, the sensitivity was effectively improved and the detection time was significantly shortened. PNA binding adjacent to the area of the target sequence homologous to the probe significantly increased the yield of the hybridization reaction between the PNA/dsDNA complex and the RecA protein-coated cssDNA probe. In this condition, the phase shift was significantly obvious and the detection time was significantly shortened. In conclusion, the combination of the RecA protein-coated cssDNA probe and the LSAW bis-PNA biosensor provides sensitivity and simple and rapid detection of clinical trace pathogenic microorganisms.

TvqodlCy.title: High-resolution melting analysis for accurate detection of BRAF mutations: a systematic review and meta-analysis.
TvqodlCy.abstract: The high-resolution melting curve analysis (HRMA) might be a good alternative method for rapid detection of BRAF mutations. However, the accuracy of HRMA in detection of BRAF mutations has not been systematically evaluated. We performed a systematic review and meta-analysis involving 1324 samples from 14 separate studies. The overall sensitivity of HRMA was 0.99 (95% confidence interval (CI) = 0.75-0.82), and the overall specificity was very high at 0.99 (95% CI = 0.94-0.98). The values for the pooled positive likelihood ratio, negative likelihood ratio, and diagnostic odds ratio were 68.01 (95% CI = 25.33-182.64), 0.06 (95% CI = 0.03-0.11), and 1263.76 (95% CI = 393.91-4064.39), respectively. The summary receiver operating characteristic curve for the same data shows an area of 1.00 and a Q* value of 0.97. The high sensitivity and specificity, simplicity, low cost, less labor or time and rapid turnaround make HRMA a good alternative method for rapid detection of BRAF mutations in the clinical practice.

8o5eDaOf.title: Test of electrochemical sensors for rapid detection pathogenic microorganisms in liquid phase
8o5eDaOf.abstract: OBJECTIVE To investigate the influential factors in the detection system of the ZnO Sol-gel electrochemical sensors in liquid phase.METHODS The electrochemical biosensors were established,ZnO sol-gel glassy carbon electrode was immobilized as the working electrode,calomel Ag/AgCl electrode was saturated as the reference electrode,platinum electrode as the counter electrode.The electrochemical behavior of electrochemical sensors changes were evaluated in different pH values and scanning potentials.RESULTS The electrochemical behavior of electrochemical sensors has markedly changed in accordance with pH value and scanning potential change.When the applied potential ranged from 0v to 0.6v and the pH value was 7.4,the biosensor exhibited the best electrochemical response.CONCLUSION We have constructed the detection system of ZnO sol-gel electrochemical biosensors and investigated interfere factors of the biosensor.

4tlYLolX.title: Study on biological signal amplification system of leaky surface acoustic wave sensor
4tlYLolX.abstract: Objective To study the feasibility of combination of "RecA protein-complementary single strand DNA" probe and bis-PNA/dsDNA complexes as the biological signal amplification system for the improvement of the sensitivity of leaky surface acoustic wave bis-peptide nucleic acid biosensor.Methods Bis-PNA probe for detecting human papilloma virus(HPV) was immobilized on the surface of gold membrane of the detection channel.After the probe was hybridized with the corresponding target DNA completely,different concentrations of "RecA protein-complementary single strand DNA probe" were added to react with bis-PNA/dsDNA complexes.Results The phase shift value was(11.74±1.03) deg at the concentration of 45 μg/ml of RecA protein,significantly different as compared with other concentrations(P<0.01).At the optimal concentration of RecA protein,the phase shift value was(10.71±0.73) deg at the concentration of 2.5 mmol/L of ATPγS,significantly different as compared with other concentrations(P<0.01).Conclusion Combination of "RecA protein-complementary single strand DNA probe" and bis-PNA/dsDNA complexes contributes to effective improvement of the sensitivity and significantly shortened detection time.
